item.title: Texans WR Collins (concussion) ruled out vs. Pats
item.description: Texans Pro Bowl wideout Nico Collins has been ruled out with a concussion ahead of Sunday's division round playoff game at the Patriots.

item.title: Reports: Realmuto sticks with Phils on $45M deal
item.description: The free agency dominoes continued to fall with J.T. Realmuto agreeing to a three-year, $45 million contract to stay with the Phillies, according to m...

item.title: Rangers GM sends letter to fans signaling retool
item.description: New York Rangers GM Chris Drury sent a letter to fans saying that the team will embark on retooling the roster.

item.title: Sources: Mets, Bichette reach 3-year, $126M deal
item.description: After missing out on Kyle Tucker, the Mets have agreed to a three-year, $126 million contract with Bo Bichette, sources confirmed to ESPN. New York pl...

item.title: Lowe to Angels, Lux to Rays in three-team trade
